backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend feature changes and their related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide with prerequisites and setup instructions for building and deploying the app.
frontend/env.json: Runtime environment configuration containing the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH-based styling including theme variables and layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features and pointing to the development guide.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component that renders the GoalsDashboard page.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Celebration modal with selfie upload and camera capture flow using useCelebrationCamera.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut chart showing monthly progress.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for selecting a month with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Yearly summary table with monthly stats, checkbox tracking, and 100% completion celebration trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when it updates.
Wraps a camera hook to ensure video preview readiness, handling playback events, timeouts, and camera controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state and actions using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, utility classes, and custom component styling.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Exports a constant list of month names and a corresponding Month type.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Implements a goal‑tracking dashboard with editable goal cards, monthly assignment, and summary table integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build settings, including module resolution and composite builds.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, env injection, path aliases, dev server proxying, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata plus a detailed description of the app’s features and a list of existing feature entries with IDs, titles, synonyms, descriptions, and versions. Serves as a structured record of implemented functionality and project state.
